summary.span: 获取或设置字节中的块对齐。

span.span: Gets or sets the block alignment in bytes.
The value for the block alignment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 播放和录音音频处理块中音频数据的软件。Software for playback and recording of audio handles audio data in blocks. 这些块的大小是属性值的倍数 。The sizes of these blocks are multiples of the value of the property. 块对齐值是原子单元 (的字节数，即特定格式的音频块) 。Block alignment value is the number of bytes in an atomic unit (that is, a block) of audio for a particular format. 对于脉冲代码调制 (PCM) 格式，用于计算块对齐的公式如下所示：For Pulse Code Modulation (PCM) formats, the formula for calculating block alignment is as follows: - 块对齐 = 每个采样字节数 x 通道数Block Alignment = Bytes per Sample x Number of Channels 例如，16位 PCM 格式 mono 音频的块对齐值为 2 (每个样本 x 1 通道) 2 个字节。For example, the block alignment value for 16-bit PCM format mono audio is 2 (2 bytes per sample x 1 channel). 对于16位 PCM 格式立体声音频，块对齐值为4。For 16-bit PCM format stereo audio, the block alignment value is 4. 从设备写入和读取的数据必须始终从块的开头开始。Data written and read from a device must always start at the beginning of a block. 例如，在示例的中间开始播放 PCM 数据是非法的， (意味着在不是块对齐) 的边界上。For example, it is illegal to start playback of PCM data in the middle of a sample (meaning on a boundary that is not block-aligned).
